sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
alongside something else
leži zraven nečesa drugega.

seg.quote: There was a butcher's shop alongside the theatre.

sense.def:
To work alongside other people
pomeni delati na istem kraju kot drugi in z njimi sodelovati.

seg.quote: The idea is to get them working on simple things alongside other people.

sense.def:
Kadar neka stvar
exists alongside another
sta v določenih okoliščinah navzoči obe stvari.

seg.quote: I cannot imagine two political systems less likely to live at peace alongside each other.
